summary: FRONT BRAKES ON 1998 MISTUBISHI ECLIPSE VIBRATE WHEN BRAKES APPLIED.  VEHICLE HAS EXPERIENCED THIS BRAKE FAILURE 4 TIMES IN THE LAST 4 YEARS.  ROTORS RESURFACED AT 12,000 MILES.  ROTORS REPLACED AT 27,000 MILES AND RESURFACED AND REPLACED AGAIN AT 77,000 MILES.  THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE.  EXTERIOR DOOR HANDLES BROKE TWICE. (PLASTIC)
